docs.name: Foreman
docs.info: Foreman API v2 is currently the default API version.

methods.name: index

apis.short_description: Llista tots els orígens d'autenticació LDAP

params.name: search
params.description: filtra els resultats

params.name: order
params.description: ordena els resultats

params.name: page
params.description: pagina els resultats

params.name: per_page
params.description: Nombre d’entrades per petició

examples:
GET /api/auth_source_ldaps
200
{
  "total": 1,
  "subtotal": 1,
  "page": 1,
  "per_page": 20,
  "search": null,
  "sort": {
    "by": null,
    "order": null
  },
  "results": [
    {
      "host": "ldap",
      "port": 123,
      "account": null,
      "base_dn": "dn=x,dn=y",
      "ldap_filter": null,
      "attr_login": "uid",
      "attr_firstname": "givenName",
      "attr_lastname": "sn",
      "attr_mail": "mail",
      "attr_photo": null,
      "onthefly_register": true,
      "usergroup_sync": true,
      "tls": true,
      "created_at": "2016-03-10 15:51:22 UTC",
      "updated_at": "2016-03-10 15:51:22 UTC",
      "id": 980190962,
      "type": "AuthSourceLdap",
      "name": "ldap-server"
    }
  ]
}

methods.name: show

params.name: id
params.validator: Must be an identifier, string from 1 to 128 characters containing only alphanumeric characters, space, underscore(_), hypen(-) with no leading or trailing space.

examples:
GET /api/auth_source_ldaps/980190962-ldap-server
200
{
  "host": "ldap",
  "port": 123,
  "account": null,
  "base_dn": "dn=x,dn=y",

methods.name: create

params.name: port
params.description: per defecte a 389

params.name: account_password
params.description: és obligatori si onthefly_register està establert a true

params.name: attr_login
params.description: és obligatori si onthefly_register està establert a true

params.name: attr_firstname
params.description: és obligatori si onthefly_register està establert a true

params.name: attr_lastname
params.description: és obligatori si onthefly_register està establert a true

params.name: attr_mail
params.description: és obligatori si onthefly_register està establert a true

params.name: usergroup_sync
params.description: sincronitza els grups d’usuaris externs a l’iniciar

params.name: groups_base
params.description: DN base dels grups

params.name: server_type
params.description: tipus de servidor LDAP

params.name: ldap_filter
params.description: Filtre LDAP

examples:
POST /api/auth_source_ldaps
{
  "auth_source_ldap": {
    "name": "ldap2",
    "host": "ldap2",
    "server_type": "posix"
  }
}
201
{
  "host": "ldap2",
  "port": 389,
  "account": null,
  "base_dn": null,
  "ldap_filter": null,
  "attr_login": null,
  "attr_firstname": null,
  "attr_lastname": null,
  "attr_mail": null,
  "attr_photo": null,
  "onthefly_register": false,

  "type": "AuthSourceLdap",
  "name": "ldap2",

}
